title: What are the chances of you getting a key when winning a Classic Normal Game
body: If you are playing with friend in a game and win you have more chances to win a key then winning alone. It gives you a higher chances to receive a key to open a Hextech Chest. We want people to start playing with your friends.{{champion:105}} {{champion:267}} {{sticker:slayer-jinx-catface}}

replies.body:
> The drop rate for key fragments is a curve, not a line. With each fragment you earn, the chance to earn your next one goes down slightly. This number resets roughly every thirty days after you earn your first key fragment.
> 

Wait, you earn keys even in a prem8 group?  I thought that applies to the chest only.

>There's no official announcement on this sadly. Riot has chosen to hold this data privately for now. However there was a guy on Reddit a few weeks ago collecting data on this.

>You can find his post[ here.](https://www.reddit.com/r/leagueoflegends/comments/4atwfj/hextech_key_fragment_drop_rate_statistics/)

>According to his results there was a 5% increase in drop chance when in a 5 man pre-made. Fairly 
decent IMO. Remember this data is quite unreliable because of changing drop rates between people.

**Telecasterdude**'s comment on [THIS](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behaviour/9V34THpq-the-piece-of-key-thing-for-crafting-the-new-mystery-box-thing) post.
you can earn fragments in any game solo or party, just party grants a higher %
